comment: Mr.Brozovsky was by far my favorite teacher this semester. From the beginning of his classes, you can tell that he truly cares for his students and their growth. There are 4 major projects, but each one has assignments that build up to it. He makes class very engaging, & he's very considerate. If you need to take English 1101, DEFINITELY pick Mr.B!

Professor B is amazing and you can tell he cares about his students and work. I really enjoyed the many different creative outlets he lets you explore through homework/projects, it made the class so much more enjoyable. For attendance, you get 6 freebies and then it starts to count against you, and also he yaps a lot (I still love him). TAKE HIM!!!

Great Professor, I've taken Mr.B for both ENGL-1101 and 1102. If given the opportunity I would surely take him again. He was very easy to work and communicate with and was effectively making sure that the concepts taught in class were understood.

Mr. B was an amazing teacher! He truly cares for students and makes the classroom a comfortable environment. The class overall is easy if you keep up with the assignments on time. Attendance does count as a grade but he is very understanding. I also wouldn't say the textbooks are required.10/10 would take him as a professor again.

Mr B. is great. He cares about his students. He is very nice and is super approachable and it was easy to ask questions. He gives amazing feedback. There are just a few major projects that you spend a lot of class time working on. It is an easy class and it was very enjoyable. You got to pick what you wrote about so that helps make it fun.
Mr, B is very helpful when it comes to anything school related or not. He makes this class very enjoyable and if I could take this class again I would.

Mr. B helped so much to make this class good. I was actually interested in what we did in class and we did a lot of fun activities. For the writing projects, we almost always had a say in what we write about which made it much easier to do. Overall, I would recommend him because i was able to grow my ability without being pushed too hard.

Mr B. was an amazing teacher, if you have the opportunity to take him, please do!! He makes class so fun with interesting lectures, funny videos, and music at the beginning of every class. Even though attendance is mandatory, it is worth it. I do not like English classes, but this is by far the best one I've taken. I really learned a lot.

Professor B, Is great. He takes the time to respond to each assignment and give honest feedback. He also cares about student success, so if you need an extension he will most likely grant it. Truly was a fantastic teacher and I would register for his ENGL 1102 class.
Mr. B is the goat i would recommend him for this course 100%. theres an attendance grade but still would recommend got by very easily. If i showed up more my grade would be higher than a B

Honestly, what a great teacher I wish there were more teachers like Mr.B, he made the class fun and interesting. 
For this being my first college class I was very happy with the outcome.
He treats students with respect and shows he really cares.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
